newsitem.title: USA: NYCE cotton futures called to open steady.
newsitem.headline: NYCE cotton futures called to open steady.

text.p: NYCE cotton futures were called to open steady as of 1021 EDT on Thursday, floor sources said.
On Thursday, the U.S. Department of Agriculture said cotton net upland sales for the 1997/98 marketing year totaled 177,300 running bales (RB).
"That is a good number for new crop sales," a Texas trader said. He also noted decent rain overnight in west Texas.
There was also good scale down mill buying under 75.00 cents, basis December, he said.
